attributes.action: keep british seaside themeparks free to enter ie pleasure beach blackpool
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
BRITAIN'S favourite free tourist attraction is to break with a century of tradition by introducing a charge for admission. 

From 2009,punters will have to pay a minimum five pounds charge to enter Blackpool Pleasure Beach or buy a ride wristband. 

Only under-threes will get in free. 

The park refused to comment but said it was telling customers about the change this year so that they had time to get used to it. 

SO WHAT DO WE WANT TO GET FROM THIS... 

Pleasure Beach Blackpool has been free to get into for well over 100yrs & we think it should stay FREE. 
We hope to try to over turn this charge. 

Please join our group then your vote counts......
